name: Iris's Scrappy Rumble
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 52, with the theme: Harvest!

Intro

Oh no! Iris the Mechanic has been kidnapped by evil robots! Help her destroy the robots and harvest resources from their corpses to create weapons to continue the fight! How long can you last? Post your scores in the comments...

Controls/Tutorial

The items you create depend on which combinations of scrap wood, scrap metal, and scrap plastic you use! Each of them has its own varying effects that have its own advantages and disadvantages in combat. Use them all to overcome each wave!

  • Move - WASD
  • Doge Roll - Spacebar
  •  Aim - Move the Mouse
  • Left Click - Craft/Throw
